prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with bright yellow fur and spiky features.
I want a design for a Pokemon resembling a small, agile creature that can generate electricity.
Generate a Pokemon that combines elements of a fox and a lightning bolt.
Make a vibrant character that embodies speed and electricity in its appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon with electric energy surging through its bright yellow fur and sharp spikes.
Design a fast and energetic Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has electric powers.
Show me a Pokemon that has a sleek body, sharp spikes, and a lively personality.
